claims.object: administration and management of essential operational elements within an organization to effectively, efficiently, and proactively utilize technology, information, and data
control hardware, software, and networking in both physical and virtual environments in order to minimize downtime and maintain business

surface_layer.definition: The management of essential operational elements within an organization.

deep_layer.mechanism: Applying IT principles to maintain operational efficiency.
deep_layer.origin: Evolved from the need to manage complex IT systems.
